catalog_script_client.name: Check Record ID

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_66c30ccd1b418d181cf976ae034bcba4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="ITCM Support">97a3408d1b418d181cf976ae034bcb81</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:12b94a6c1b240dd01cf976ae034bcb47</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Check Record ID</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }
    if (g_form.getValue('what_is_this_request_for') == 'record_unlock') {
		var ga = new GlideAjax('glideSessionToken');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getSessionToken');
		var sessionToken = ga.getXML(SessionToken);

		
    } 
}
function SessionToken(response){
	var sessionToken = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer'); 
	var ra = new GlideAjax('glideRecordID');
	ra.addParam('sysparm_name', 'checkRiskAssessment');
	ra.addParam('sysparm_recordid', g_form.getValue('risk_assessment_id_s'));
	ra.addParam('sysparm_sessiontoken', sessionToken);
	ra.getXML(RecordId);
}

function RecordId(response){
	var recordID = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer'); 
	if(recordID != 'Invalid Risk Assessment'){
		var responseBody= JSON.parse(recordID)["RequestedObject"];
		var authorsUser = responseBody["FieldContents"]["10084"]["Value"]["UserList"];
		var authorsGroup = responseBody["FieldContents"]["10084"]["Value"]["GroupList"];
		var stewards = responseBody["FieldContents"]["16277"]["Value"]["UserList"];

		var auxAuthorsUser = [];
		var auxAuthorsGroup = [];

		var auxStewards = [];

		var recordname = responseBody["FieldContents"]["10082"]["Value"];
		var custodian = responseBody["FieldContents"]["13338"]["Value"]["UserList"][0]["Id"];
		var owner = responseBody["FieldContents"]["10866"]["Value"]["UserList"][0]["Id"];


	  for (var i = 0; i < authorsUser.length; i++) {
		auxAuthorsUser.push(authorsUser[i]["Id"]);
	  }

	  for (var i = 0; i < authorsGroup.length; i++) {
		auxAuthorsGroup.push(authorsGroup[i]["Id"]);
	  }

	  for (var i = 0; i < stewards.length; i++) {
		auxStewards.push(stewards[i]["Id"]);
	  }

	  var authorsuser = auxAuthorsUser;
	  var authorsgroup = auxAuthorsGroup;
	  var steward = auxStewards;
	  var output = [recordname, custodian, owner, authorsuser, authorsgroup, steward];
	  console.log(output);
	  	
	
	}else{
		alert("Record " +  g_form.getValue('risk_assessment_id_s') + " is not a valid Risk Assessment");
		g_form.clearValue('risk_assessment_id_s');
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>SA\ACSIMOE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-12 15:36:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>66c30ccd1b418d181cf976ae034bcba4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check Record ID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ITCM Support" source="x_iem_itcm_support">f01ed1941b6cc5d01cf976ae034bcb86</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITCM Support">f01ed1941b6cc5d01cf976ae034bcb86</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_66c30ccd1b418d181cf976ae034bcba4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SA\ACSIMOE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-12 15:36:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
